info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.dns_zone.rrset
info.description:
x-required
APIs to create, update or delete individual records of a DNS zone without having to send the whole DNS zone information.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

dns_zoneAFSDBRecordSubtype.description:
AFS Volume Location Server or DCE Authentication Server.

 - NONE: NONE

 - AFSVolumeLocationServer: AFS Volume Location Server

 - DCEAuthenticationServer: DCE Authentication Server
dns_zoneAFSDBRecordSubtype.title: AFSDB Record Subtype

hostname.description:
Server name of the AFS cell database server or the DCE name server.

Example: ` "mail.example.com"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.hostname: true
hostname.title: Hostname

dns_zoneCERTAlgorithm.description:
CERT algorithm value must be compatible with the specified algorithm.

 - RESERVEDALGORITHM: RESERVEDALGORITHM

 - RSAMD5: RSAMD5

 - DH: DH

 - DSASHA1: DSASHA1

 - ECC: ECC

 - RSASHA1ALGORITHM: RSA-SHA1

 - INDIRECT: INDIRECT

 - PRIVATEDNS: PRIVATEDNS

 - PRIVATEOID: PRIVATEOID
dns_zoneCERTAlgorithm.title: CERT Algorithm

cert_key_tag.description:
Example: ` "3"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
cert_key_tag.title: Key Tag

certificate.description:
Certificate in base 64 format.

Example: ` "Ab100cFg"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 4096
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 1
certificate.title: Certificate

name.description:
CERT Record name, please provide only the specific subdomain or record name without the base domain.

Example: ` "www or mail or * or ww* or *ab"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.pattern: ^([a-zA-Z0-9*?]|([a-zA-Z0-9?*]+-[a-zA-Z0-9*?]+)){0,253}
name.title: Record Name
name.x-ves-example: www or mail or * or ww* or *ab

values.description:
Example: ` "values"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.max_items: 100
  ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.min_items: 1
values.title: CERT Value

dns_zoneCERTType.description:
CERT type value must be compatible with the specified types.

 - INVALIDCERTTYPE: INVALIDCERTTYPE

 - PKIX: PKIX

 - SPKI: SPKI

 - PGP: PGP

 - IPKIX: IPKIX

 - ISPKI: ISPKI

 - IPGP: IPGP

 - ACPKIX: ACPKIX

 - IACPKIX: IACPKIX

 - URI_: URI

 - OID: OID
dns_zoneCERTType.title: CERT Type

flags.description:
This flag should be an integer between 0 and 255.

Example: ` "0"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 255
flags.title: Certification authority authorization flags

dns_zoneDLVResourceRecord.description:
x-displayName: "DNS DLV Record"
DNS DLV Record
dns_zoneDLVResourceRecord.title: DLVResourceRecord

name.description:
x-displayName: "Record Name (Excluding Domain name)"
x-example: "www or mail or * or ww* or *ab"
DLV Record name, please provide only the specific subdomain or record name without the base domain.
name.title: Record Name

values.description:
x-displayName: "DLV Value"
x-example: "values"
x-required
It uses the same format as the DS record.
values.title: DLV Value

dns_zoneDSKeyAlgorithm.description:
DS key value must be compatible with the specified algorithm.

 - UNSPECIFIED: UNSPECIFIED

 - RSASHA1: RSASHA1

 - RSASHA1NSEC3SHA1: RSASHA1-NSEC3-SHA1

 - RSASHA256: RSASHA256

 - RSASHA512: RSASHA512

 - ECDSAP256SHA256: ECDSAP256SHA256

 - ECDSAP384SHA384: ECDSAP384SHA384

 - ED25519: ED25519

 - ED448: ED448
dns_zoneDSKeyAlgorithm.title: DS Key Algorithm

key_tag.description:
A short numeric value which can help quickly identify the referenced DNSKEY-record.

Example: ` "15228"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 1
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
key_tag.title: Key Tag

altitude.description:
Altitude in meters

Example: ` "20.3"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.float.gte: -100000.00
  ves.io.schema.rules.float.lte: 42849672.95
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
altitude.title: Altitude

horizontal_precision.description:
Horizontal Precision in meters

Example: ` "30.00m"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.float.gte: 0.0
  ves.io.schema.rules.float.lte: 90000000.00
horizontal_precision.title: Horizontal Precision

latitude_degree.description:
Latitude degree, an integer between 0 and 90, including 0 and 90

Example: ` "51"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.int32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.int32.lte: 90
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
latitude_degree.title: Latitude degree

latitude_minute.description:
Latitude minute, an integer between 0 and 59, including 0 and 59

Example: ` "30"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.int32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.int32.lte: 59
latitude_minute.title: Latitude minute

Latitude second, an decimal between 0 and 59.999, including 0 and 59.999

Example: ` "12.000"`

  ves.io.schema.rules.float.gte: 0.0
  ves.io.schema.rules.float.lte: 59.999

  ves.io.schema.rules.float.lte: 90000000.00

  ves.io.schema.rules.int32.lte: 59

dns_zoneLatitudeHemisphere.description:
Latitude hemisphere can only be N or S

 - N: North Hemisphere

 - S: South Hemisphere
dns_zoneLatitudeHemisphere.title: Latitude Hemisphere

dns_zoneLongitudeHemisphere.description:
Longitude hemisphere can only be E or W

 - E: East Hemisphere

 - W: West Hemisphere
dns_zoneLongitudeHemisphere.title: Longitude Hemisphere

domain.description:
Mail exchanger domain name, please provide the full hostname, for example: mail.example.com

Example: ` "mail.example.com"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.hostname: true
domain.title: Domain

priority.description:
Mail exchanger priority code

Example: ` "10"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
priority.title: Priority

flags.description:
Flag to control aspects of the rewriting and interpretation of the fields in the record. At this time only four flags, S/A/U/P, are defined.

Example: ` ""`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 255
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.pattern: ^(S|s|A|a|U|u|P|p)$
flags.title: Flags

order.description:
Order in which the NAPTR records must be processed. A lower number indicates a higher preference.

Example: ` "10"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
order.title: Order

preference.description:
Preference when records have the same order. A lower number indicates a higher preference.

Example: ` "10"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
preference.title: Preference

regexp.description:
Regular expression to construct the next domain name to lookup.

Example: ` ""`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 255
regexp.title: Regular Expression

replacement.description:
The next NAME to query for NAPTR, SRV, or address records depending on the value of the flags field.

Example: ` ""`
replacement.title: Replacement

service.description:
Specifies the service(s) available down this rewrite path.

Example: ` ""`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 255
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.pattern: ^([A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]{0,31}(\\+[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]{0,31})*$|^$)
service.title: Protocol Resolution Service

dns_zoneRRSet.title: RRSet is a set of Resource Record Sets for specific type

digest.description:
The 'digest' is the DS key and the actual contents of the DS record. 

Example: ` "addf120b430021c36c232c99ef8d926aea2acd6b"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 40
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 40
digest.title: Digest

fingerprint.description:
The 'fingerprint' is the DS key and the actual contents of the DS record. 

Example: ` "addf120b430021c36c232c99ef8d926aea2acd6b"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 40
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 40
fingerprint.title: Fingerprint

digest.description:
The 'digest' is the DS key and the actual contents of the DS record. 

Example: ` "ba7816bf8f01cfea414140de5dae2223b00361a396177a9cb410ff61f20015ad"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 64
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 64
digest.title: Digest

fingerprint.description:
The 'fingerprint' is the DS key and the actual contents of the DS record. 

Example: ` "ba7816bf8f01cfea414140de5dae2223b00361a396177a9cb410ff61f20015ad"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 64
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 64
fingerprint.title: Fingerprint

digest.description:
The 'digest' is the DS key and the actual contents of the DS record. 

Example: ` "b4a9b28d142d91968ca232b95dfca771ee66f99924148b85026dfa686f6288d0edbfa71c98a798fda71e130f48e8f0f8"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 96
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 96
digest.title: Digest

port.description:
Port on which the service can be found

Example: ` "10"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
port.title: Port

priority.description:
Priority of the target. A lower number indicates a higher preference.

Example: ` "10"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
priority.title: Priority

target.description:
Hostname of the machine providing the service

Example: ` "my.example.com"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.pattern: ^[.]$|^([a-zA-Z0-9]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{0,62})(\\.[a-zA-Z0-9_]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{0,62})*?(\\.[a-zA-Z]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9]{0,62})\\.?$
target.title: Target

weight.description:
Weight of the target. A higher number indicates a higher preference.

Example: ` "10"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 0
  ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
weight.title: Weight

dns_zoneSSHFPAlgorithm.description:
SSHFP algorithm value must be compatible with the specified algorithm.

 - UNSPECIFIEDALGORITHM: UNSPECIFIEDALGORITHM

 - RSA: RSA

 - DSA: DSA

 - ECDSA: ECDSA

 - Ed25519: Ed25519

 - Ed448: Ed448
dns_zoneSSHFPAlgorithm.title: SSHFP Algorithm

dns_zoneSSHFPFingerprintType.description:
x-displayName: "SSHFP Fingerprint Type"
SSHFP Fingerprint Type must be compatible with the specified values.

 - INVALIDFINGERPRINTTYPE: INVALIDFINGERPRINTTYPE

x-displayName: "Invalid Fingerprint Type"
 - SHA1ALGORITHM: SHA1ALGORITHM

x-displayName: "SHA1"
 - SHA256ALGORITHM: SHA256ALGORITHM

x-displayName: "SHA256"
dns_zoneSSHFPFingerprintType.title: SSHFP Fingerprint Type

name.description:
SSHFP Record name, please provide only the specific subdomain or record name without the base domain.

Example: ` "www or mail or * or ww* or *ab"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.pattern: ^([a-zA-Z0-9*?]|([a-zA-Z0-9?*]+-[a-zA-Z0-9*?]+)){0,253}
name.title: Record Name
name.x-ves-example: www or mail or * or ww* or *ab

values.description:
Example: ` "values"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.max_items: 100
  ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.min_items: 1
values.title: SSHFP Value

dns_zoneTLSARecordCSelector.description:
- FullCertificate: Full Certificate

 - UseSubjectPublicKey: Use Subject Public Key
dns_zoneTLSARecordCSelector.title: TLSA Record Selector

dns_zoneTLSARecordCertificateUsage.description:
- CertificateAuthorityConstraint: Certificate Authority Constraint

 - ServiceCertificateConstraint: Service Certificate Constraint

 - TrustAnchorAssertion: Trust Anchor Assertion

 - DomainIssuedCertificate: Domain Issued Certificate
dns_zoneTLSARecordCertificateUsage.title: TLSA Record Certificate Usage

dns_zoneTLSARecordMatchingType.description:
- NoHash: No Hash

 - SHA256: SHA-256

 - SHA512: SHA-512
dns_zoneTLSARecordMatchingType.title: TLSA Record Matching Type

certificate_association_data.description:
The actual data to be matched given the settings of the other fields.

Example: ` "Certificate Association Data"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.hex: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 4096
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_len: 1
certificate_association_data.title: Certificate Association Data

name.description:
TLSA Record name, please provide only the specific subdomain or record name without the base domain.

Example: ` "www or mail or * or ww* or *ab"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.pattern: ^([a-zA-Z0-9*?]|([a-zA-Z0-9?*]+-[a-zA-Z0-9*?]+)){0,253}
name.title: Record Name
name.x-ves-example: www or mail or * or ww* or *ab

  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.max_items: 100
  ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.min_items: 1

type.description:
Required: YES

  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.in: [\"A\",\"AAAA\",\"ALIAS\",\"CAA\",\"CNAME\",\"MX\",\"NS\",\"PTR\",\"SRV\",\"TXT\",\"DNSLB\",\"NAPTR\",\"AFSDB\",\"EUI48\",\"EUI64\",\"DS\",\"CDS\",\"LOC\",\"SSHFP\",\"TLSA\",\"CERT\"]
type.title: type

schemaviewsObjectRefType.description:
This type establishes a direct reference from one object(the referrer) to another(the referred).
Such a reference is in form of tenant/namespace/name
schemaviewsObjectRefType.title: ObjectRefType

name.description:
When a configuration object(e.g. virtual_host) refers to another(e.g route)
 then name will hold the referred object's(e.g. route's) name.

Example: ` "contacts-route"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_bytes: 128
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.min_bytes: 1
name.title: name
name.x-ves-example: contacts-route

namespace.description:
When a configuration object(e.g. virtual_host) refers to another(e.g route)
 then namespace will hold the referred object's(e.g. route's) namespace.

Example: ` "ns1"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_bytes: 64
namespace.title: namespace

tenant.description:
When a configuration object(e.g. virtual_host) refers to another(e.g route)
 then tenant will hold the referred object's(e.g. route's) tenant.

Example: ` "acmecorp"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_bytes: 64
tenant.title: tenant
